Text: Energy Efficiency info for Green Power meeting Cc Elliott I apologize for sending this at the last minute but wanted to see if you might be able to incorporate some information regarding the Energy Efficiency Credits Program Stacey and I have been working on in PA into your presentation for next weeks Green Power meeting I have attached the latest draft there are some minor changes that are not reflected of the program proposal which we hope to have approved by the Greene Board in September and three power point slides I think were made real headway in PA and we hope to use this as a template for other states Please call Stacey or me if you have any questions Thanks Heather
